Name: QuestionReference
Description: Reference to a QuestionItem, QuestionGrid, or QuestionBlock.

Name: ResponseSequence
Description: Describes the sequencing of the response options to the question for this application.

Name: DimensionSequence
Description: Describes the sequencing of the dimension within a QuestionGrid for this application.

Name: ResponseUnit
Description: Identifies the intended Response unit (respondent). Supports the use of an external controlled vocabulary. The DDI Alliance has provided a controlled vocabulary (ResponseUnit) to support this element at http://www.ddialliance.org/controlled-vocabularies.

Name: AnalysisUnit
Description: The analysis unit, expressed as a term which may come from a controlled vocabulary. The DDI Alliance has provided a controlled vocabulary (AnalysisUnit) to support this element at http://www.ddialliance.org/controlled-vocabularies.

Name: UniverseReference
Description: Reference to the universe statement containing a description of the persons or other elements that this variable refers to, and to which any analytic results refer. If more than one universe is referenced the universe of the variable is the intersect of the referenced universes.

Name: EstimatedSecondsResponseTime
Description: The estimated amount of time required to answer a question expressed in seconds. Decimal values should be used to define fractions of seconds. At the question construct level it refers to the estimated time within the context of is use in a questionnaire.
